participant_2.background:
I hiked and swam at the lake on my last vacation.
I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.
he taught me right from wrong.
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like the music of my father's era.

content.text: What did you do last on your vacation?
I went to a lake and hiked and swam!
That sounds fun! I love hiking. I would have lunch with my mom if I could, she makes the best comfort food!
That's so sweet! I wish I had more social interaction when I was younger, I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age now.
That's okay, it's never too late to make new friends! I wear contacts too, they're so much more comfortable than glasses.
Yeah, I love my contacts! My dad taught me right from wrong, he's the best.
My dad is awesome too, I love listening to music from his era, it makes me feel nostalgic.
Me too! I love the music from the 70s and 80s.
